author: NicoleS_Patron
title: In walking distance to all main attractions
text:
We recently spent 8 nights here and were very happy with our choice. The location of the hotel could not be better, very central and all main attractions were in walking distance.
The staff were friendly and helpful both during our stay, check-in and check-out.
The hotel has a lovely bar with a great view on Times Square.
We stayed on the 31st floor, which has an amazing view on the neighbouring building and on Times Square. The room and the bathroom are very spacious. The room had all the amenities we required, as well as a good size desk, it also had big windows, which made the room very bright. However, it was equipped with thick curtains to dim the room during the night. There is a grocery store right next to the hotel, which was very convenient for buying water, snacks etc.
As a side note, the shower area in the bathroom was a bit questionable, because it left the shower area soaked in water after showers. Nevertheless, the staff did a great job everyday cleaning up and keeping the entire room neat and tidy.
All in all, it was a great experience and we will stay here again next time, also we would surely recommend this hotel.
Keep up the amazing job Novotel Team!
